button.uploadDocuments.description: Text in button, which allows user to upload documents

message.introductionForKnowledge.message: Documents can be added to the knowledge base, and when the robot responds, it can use the knowledge in the repository to reply.

message.introductionForRepository.message: The knowledge base is a collection of documents where you can add documents. When the robot answers, it will respond from the documents in the knowledge base.

message.uploadDocumentsExceed.description: Error message when uploaded document quantity exceeds limit

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when failed to upload document

message.uploadDocumentsSuccess.description: Success message when document upload is successful

message.createDocumentSuccess.description: Success message when document creation is successful

message.startCreateDocument.description: Message when starting to learn document

message.createDocumentError.description: Error message when failed to learn document

message.dragOrClickToUpload.message: Drag or click to upload document
message.dragOrClickToUpload.description: Message to drag or click to upload document

message.errorApiError.message: Failed to respond, please try again later
message.errorApiError.description: Error message when failed to respond

message.errorBadRequest.message: Request content is not formatted correctly, please ask again
message.errorBadRequest.description: Error message when request content is not formatted correctly

message.errorNoConversation.message: Conversation content does not exist or has expired, please start a new conversation
message.errorNoConversation.description: Error message when conversation content does not exist or has expired

message.errorContentTooLarge.message: Question content is too long, please shorten and try again
message.errorContentTooLarge.description: Error message when question content is too long

message.errorTooManyRequests.message: Your operation is too frequent, please try again later
message.errorTooManyRequests.description: Error message when operation is too frequent

message.errorUsedUp.message: Your package usage limit has been reached, please purchase more usage to continue
message.errorUsedUp.description: Error message when package usage limit has been reached

message.errorUnknown.message: An unknown server error occurred, please try again later or contact customer service
message.errorUnknown.description: Error message when unknown server error occurred

message.errorTimeout.message: Answering question timed out, please try again later
message.errorTimeout.description: Error message when answering question timed out

message.errorNotApplied.message: You have not applied for this service yet, please apply before continuing to ask
message.errorNotApplied.description: Error message when user has not applied for this service yet

message.howToUse.description: Message to show how to line break

message.createRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when knowledge base is created successfully

message.createRepositoryFailed.description: Error message when failed to create knowledge base

message.deleteRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when knowledge base is deleted successfully

message.deleteDocumentSuccess.description: Success message when document is deleted successfully

message.currentRepository.description: Message to show current knowledge base

message.nameRequired.description: Error message when name is empty

message.inputRepositoryName.description: Input placeholder for knowledge base name

message.inputRepositoryDescription.message: Describe your knowledge base in one sentence
message.inputRepositoryDescription.description: Input placeholder for knowledge base description

message.supportedFiles.description: Message to show supported file types
